name: Baked Mackerel In Mustard-Scallion Sauce
keywords: mackerel, scallion, whole-grain mustard, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 to 2 3/4 pound whole mackerel, cleaned, gutted but left whole
4 scallions, finely chopped, including the green tops

recipeInstructions.text: Score the mackerel on both sides, making two or three large X's one-half-inch deep with a small sharp knife. Squeeze the half lemon over the fish.

Combine and stir the remaining ingredients. Coat the mackerel with this mixture and allow to marinate one-half hour. Turn once during the marinating so the cuts in the fish are well coated with the sauce.
Place mackerel in a small buttered oval baking dish and bake until the fish is opaque. Serve at once.
